categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Scalp Treatments
about: What it is: A 100 percent, drug-free, botanical-based regimen that fuels fatigued follicles, nourishes the scalp, and thickens each hairu2014ideal for mild to moderate thinning...Hair Type: Fine and Medium..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Concerns:.- Thinning.- Scalp Buildup.- Antiaging..Key Benefits:.- Stimulates the hair follicle.- Repairs damage.- Thickens each strand..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Alpha Keratin 60ku CLINICAL Protein: A protein duo that encourages growth with microbiome-balancing ingredients..- Biomimetic Signal Peptides: Nourish and calm the scalp to help create a healthy environment for growth..- Larch Wood Extract: Encourages the initiation of the anagen growth phase...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This set, including Flourish Shampoo and Conditioner for Thinning Hair and Density Booster, works to cleanse, purify, and enrich the scalp while delivering thicker, stronger hair and encouraging healthy growth. Virtueu2019s Alpha Keratin 60ku CLINICAL protein nourishes and fortifies new and existing strands, so hair looks gorgeous while youu2019re growing more. Expect results in as few as four weeks. Itu2019s perfect for anyone experiencing mild to moderate thinning or loss due to temporary factors such as postpartum, stress, or diet. The shampoo delicately removes scalp buildup, cleanses the hair shaft, and clears debris from follicle openings, creating an environment for healthy growth. The conditioner is a lightweight hair strengthener, hydrator, and detangler in one that nourishes and thickens fine, fragile strands without weighing down hair. The Density Booster is a potent, botanical-based nutrient infusion for the scalp that fuels fatigued follicles and nurtures new, fragile hairs so they thicken and thrive...Fragrance Description: A gentle, spa-like blend of aromatic herbs, bright citrus, clean flowers, and balancing woods, with basil and patchouli essential oils for scalp care and healthy hair...Clinical Results: After 6 months of regimen use in an independent, third-party test of 35 women:.- 97% saw healthier hair growth after 3 months.- 91% saw less fall out.- 94% said Flourish is more effective than other hair growth solutions they've tried..This Set Contains:.- 2 oz/ 60 mL Flourish Shampoo for Thinning Hair.- 2 oz/ 60 mL Flourish Conditioner for Thinning Hair.- 2 oz/ 60 mL Flourish Density Booster

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Shampoo For Thinning Hair: .-Work a quarter-size amount of shampoo into a lather between palms..-Apply to wet hair and massage into scalp, starting at the nape of your neck, and work the lather through the ends..-Rinse thoroughly...Conditioner For Thinning Hair: .-Work a quarter-size amount of conditioner between palms..-Apply to wet hair, from mid-shaft to ends..-Leave in for one to three minutes..-Rinse thoroughly...Density Booster: .-Lift damp or dry hair into sections..-Spray directly onto scalp..-Gently massage in..-Do not rinse..-Use once daily.

reviews.review_title: It worked gradually thickening my hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Virtue Labs recently gifted me their Flourish Hair Rejuvenation Treatment Set for Volume. This set contains: Flourish Shampoo for Thinning Hair, this shampoo has a clear yellowish gel texture with a mixed herbal, floral, and citrusy scent that is very pleasant. It cleans all the build-up on my scalp and lathers well. Flourish Conditioner for Thinning Hair, this conditioner has a thick milky white cream-like texture, almost like a hair mask consistency. It has the same scent as the shampoo. It detangles, nourishes and hydrates the hair without weighing it down. Flourish Density Booster, it comes in a spray bottle to make the application easier. Itu2019s clear and watery and has the same scent as the shampoo and conditioner but is more intense. It doesnu2019t bother me, but it might for some. This complete set worked and reduced my hair fall within almost two weeks of usage every other day. It works gradually, thickening a few spots on my scalp that are visibly thinning. Iu2019m so excited that this worked. Thanks, Virtue Labs!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product complimentary from Virtue. This set is designed for those with mild to moderate thinning hair. Hair fall and thinning hair is something I've gone back and forth with over the years. Right now, my hair is thinning and I was happy to receive this product. This set includes shampoo, conditioner and a density booster. After a few weeks of use, I have noticed that my hair appears to be fuller and I'm not losing as much. The products are not drying on the hair and also help with an itchy scalp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay love this. It has made such a visible difference to my hair. Not sure about hair growth but my hair oils and feels denser to me! I will say it dries them out a bit so use extra conditioner but other thank that itu2019s pretty good. Gifted by virtue labs

reviews.review_text: I received complimentary from Virtue. As someone with fine, thinning hair I am always on the lookout for hair care that will help add volume to it. So I was interested in trying out this system designed for hair like mine. The shampoo lathers well and does a good job of removing oil and grime without stripping the hair. The conditioner is kinda heavy for my taste. I have to use a very small amount or it leaves a residue in my hair which makes it look greasy. I havenu2019t used the density booster long enough to see any results yet but I will keep using it daily. I do like that itu2019s non-greasy and doesnu2019t weigh my hair down. I feel anyone who is experiencing thinning can appreciate that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The set includes a shampoo, conditioner, and serum, all of which are infused with Virtue's proprietary Alpha Keratin 60ku technology. This technology helps to repair and strengthen damaged hair from the inside out, while also promoting healthy hair growth and increasing the overall density and fullness of your hair.  In addition to their effectiveness, these products also have a pleasant, subtle scent that lingers in your hair for hours after you use them. They're also free from harsh chemicals and sulfates, so they're gentle enough for daily use without causing any damage or irritation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was shedding pretty excessively compared to my normal amount. Iu2019ve tried many different brands for hair thinning that did okay but after two weeks of using the virtue drug free flourish line I have noticed an incredible difference in my shedding. This line also smells very fresh and pleasant in my opinion. The shampoo is cleansing but not stripping, the conditioner does not hydrate all that much for my 3a medium porosity low density curly hair but not an issue for me, and the daily scalp treatment is light weight and not greasy. I will continue to use and hopefully continue to see results. This photo is of my shedding in the shower the week before starting the virtue line and then two weeks after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After losing a significant amount of hair due to health issues, I was desperate for drug-free treatment. I looked into Nutrafol but it isn't approved for women TTC. I've tried other Virtue products and trusted the brand, so I thought I would give this set a try. I just completed my 2nd month of religious use and I'm starting to see early signs of results. I can't say that my hair looks noticeably fuller yet, but I have seen a significant improvement in the amount of hair that falls out in the shower. Formerly, I was cleaning out handfuls of hair from the shower drain. Now, I find only a few strands - about 5-10% of what used to fall out. I'm beginning to see baby hairs starting to fill in.  The shampoo and conditioner have a very mild scent. The booster is quite scented, but I think it smells nice.  The only downside is that the shampoo/conditioner only lasted me 60 days (I bought a 90-day supply), but I do have rather oily hair. The booster will certainly last the full 90 days. I've already repurchased the shampoo.
